profile:
For over 30 years, EC Foundations has been dedicated to delivering innovative, effective, and lasting foundation repair solutions for homeowners in the Ottawa community. With more than 5000 successful foundation repairs under our belts, we have extensive knowledge of the varying types of foundations and soil conditions in the Ottawa region.

The EC Foundations team is comprised of highly skilled and experienced professionals. We take the time to thoroughly examine your foundation, consult senior engineers when necessary, and deliver the highest standard of service with a solution that will ensure your foundation is repaired once and for all.

Your home is more than where you hang your hat; it’s your most valuable asset. It deserves the utmost care and attention.
We have the knowledge and experience to find the right solution to protect your home or business from the elements, and the skills to implement that solution quickly, efficiently and cost-effectively.
Whether it’s a waterproofing application to preserve the newly-laid foundation of a brand new house, repairing, waterproofing, or foundation crack repair, choose wisely.
It’s important to work with a company that takes as much pride in their craftsmanship as you do in your home.

profile:
Estra Flooring has been serving the Ottawa community with uncompromising quality and exceptional customer service in the flooring industry since 1971. Now in our second generation, we continue to combine old world artisanship with the latest in flooring technology, with a wide variety of styles and products to accommodate a vast spectrum of home and commercial décor.

Our portfolio includes a number of notable and prestigious projects including hardwood flooring at the main function room at Rideau Hall, 24 Sussex Drive, the Rideau Club, the Committee Room on Parliament Hill and all the hardwood flooring at the National Gallery of Canada including the Rideau Street Chapel which has been reassembled there as a permanent exhibit.

Pre-Finished and Unfinished Wood Installation - simple and complex installations.
Sanding and Staining - change the mood and color of your floors, or renew the look of worn out existing hardwood floors.

Screen and Coat - refresh the sheen and the glamour, removes existing finish replaces it for a much cleaner and fresher look.

Our specialties include:

Custom Hardwood including rare & exotic woods,

Solid & Engineered,

Laminates, Cork, Bamboo

Ceramic Tile, Glass Tile

Luxury Vinyl Tile

Carpet and Carpet Tile

Condo (sound absorbent) floors

Sales, Service, Custom Designs, Free on site Estimates.

Residential –  primarily our business comes from our valued residential clients. We offer the utmost in friendly and practical advice, making sure that whatever your budget, we can make your dreams come true.

Commercial – Estra Flooring has maintained special relationships with Ottawa’s most prestigious architects, designers, builders and agencies such as Ottawa Community Housing as a result of our goal to achieve the best result as dictated by our commercial partners' expertise.

From the Rideau Hall to your home, the service we provide is of unparalleled quality.

Please visit our showroom located at 439 Preston Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1S 4N5

Monday through Saturday, Office:  613-233-0149                          

At Estra Flooring the coffee and hospitality is always on!

profile:
The Foundation Guys have been an industry leader in foundation repairs and waterproofing since 1978. As part of the international Foundation Supportworks and Basement Systems network, we have top of the line products and training to ensure that all of our work is completed to the highest standards. We pride ourselves on working with all of our customers to ensure that they fully understand the work being done, and are completely satisfied with the results. Your foundation is a crucial part of your family’s comfort and safety. If you’re looking for a local foundation contractor in Ontario, you’ve come to the right place.

High quality Foundation repair and waterproofing service. At The Foundation Guys, we have over 40 years experience in foundation repair, basement waterproofing, and masonry restoration using the most advanced products and techniques. We educate our clients and encourage them to research the work being done on their home. We are always committed to a job well done and deliver value, honesty, and master craftsmanship. You can trust us to expertly service all of your foundation needs.

profile:
Since 1979, Ottawa Structural Residential Services Ltd. is Ottawa-Carleton's largest and most experienced, family owned and operated, full service residential waterproofing, foundation repair and restoration firm. 

A large percentage of our work comes to us through word-of-mouth referrals from past clients.  We value that trust and work very hard to ensure that we exceed your expectations. 

With more than 30,000 (and counting), dry basements and happy customers, we continue to grow our company, one satisfied customer at a time - putting service first - it's been that way since 1979. 

We offer what other companies simply cannot
   	
* We have worked in every community in the Ottawa-Carleton area and have a thorough knowledge of the environmental/soil conditions where you live.

* We have waterproofed and/or repaired tens of thousands of residential and commercial foundations and can offer you interior and exterior solutions.  No company in the Ottawa-Carleton area has seen and solved as many wet basement problems as we have.

* Collective experience of management and staff results in unsurpassed quality of services.

* Affordable, competitive pricing as a result of our many years of experience and superior purchasing power.

* Innovative products and applications as a result of our commitment to excellence and attention to detail.

* We won't recommend an expensive weeping tile or pier solution if all you need is a foundation crack repair, nor will we offer you a bandage solution at a low-ball price, leaving you with a problem that will recur a few months later.  We will diagnose the problem accurately and offer solutions that will save you money in the short and long run.

* We stand behind our work with written, transferable guarantees.

We operate from our own 16,000 square foot building and offer a full range of affordable, professional, all season services.  We are experts in systems involving foundation repairs, underpinning, foundation wall replacement, interior drainage, concrete and masonry restoration.
